scripts.docker:status: docker system df && docker ps && docker volume ls && docker network ls
scripts.docker:clean:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v --remove-orphans && docker volume rm zephyr_postgres_data_dev zephyr_redis_data_dev zephyr_minio_data_dev
scripts.docker:clean:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down -v --remove-orphans && docker volume rm zephyr_postgres_data_prod zephyr_redis_data_prod zephyr_minio_data_prod zephyr_postgres_logs_prod
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker rmi $(docker images -q) -f && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q) && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -af
